CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper September 25, 1943, pg. 19, reads: "Joe Louis Shows a Boxing Soldier How to Block a Punch; Spars with Nicholson - Thousands of soldiers got the thrill of their lives last Monday at Shenango when Heavyweight Champion Joe Louis appeared there with his troupe of boxers.  In the photo at the left, Joe shows a member of the Shenango boxing team how to block and punch and counter with a left hook... - U. S. Army and Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Boxer Joe Louis in army uniform with two other men instructing boxer in ring at Shenango Veterans Hospital
